entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
